## Submission Checklist

**Before submitting, verify:**

- [ ] I am submitting from a **feature branch**, NOT from `main`
- [ ] My branch is named correctly: `submission/YYYY-FamilyName-type` (e.g., `submission/2026-Chen-ssh-key`)
- [ ] My files follow the naming convention: `YYYY-FamilyName-FirstName` or `YYYY-FamilyName1-FamilyName2-FamilyName3`
- [ ] I have only ASCII characters in file/folder names (no Chinese, no spaces)
- [ ] My submission does not contain any personally identifiable information (PII)
- [ ] I have included a license declaration (Apache 2.0 for code, CC-BY-4.0 for docs)

---

## Submission Details

**Type:** <!-- ssh-key / case-brief / data / code / slides / video / reflection / report -->

**Author(s):** <!-- YYYY-FamilyName-FirstName (or group members) -->

**Description:**
<!-- Brief description of what you're submitting -->

---

## Important Reminders

> **WARNING: PRs from `main` branch will be rejected!**
>
> If your PR is from your fork's `main` branch, please:
> 1. Close this PR
> 2. Create a feature branch: `git checkout -b submission/YYYY-YourName-type`
> 3. Push and create a new PR from that branch
>
> See the [README](../README.md#creating-a-submission-branch) for detailed instructions.

---

*Delete this section after reading:*
- Replace the placeholders above with your actual information
- Check all boxes that apply
- Remove any sections that don't apply to your submission
